metadata.title: Chat Recap AI: Free online tool to analyze Chat without signup - chatrecap.io
metadata.description: Want to analyze your chat history? ChatRecap AI helps you understand conversations across WhatsApp, Instagram, Snapchat, Discord, and Telegram. Get cross-platform insights and discover your communication patterns.
metadata.keywords: chatrecap, chat analyzer, whatsapp analyzer, instagram chat analysis, discord chat analysis, telegram analyzer, snapchat analysis, chat history, conversation patterns, messaging insights, cross platform chat analysis, chat export, chat metrics

my_orders.title: My Analysis History
my_orders.tip: Upload a chat to get started

blog.title: Relationship Insights
blog.description: Tips, resources, and updates about relationship communication

my_invites.invite_tip: Invite a friend to use Chat Recap AI, get 5 free credits.
my_invites.no_orders: You need to analyze at least one chat before inviting others
my_invites.no_affiliates: Invite program currently by approval only. Contact us to apply.

chat_analysis.title: Chat Recap AI
chat_analysis.subtitle: Your AI Chat Analysis
chat_analysis.description: Transform your conversations with Chat Recap AI. Unlock the hidden patterns and insights in your chats. Understand relationships on a deeper level.
chat_analysis.upload_description: Upload your chat export to analyze
chat_analysis.how_to_import: How to Import Chat from WhatsApp
chat_analysis.privacy_notice: We do not store your chat history, the cached file on our server will be automatically deleted after 30 minutes.
chat_analysis.supported_formats: Supported: .txt file or .zip containing a .txt file (max 5MB)
chat_analysis.placeholder: Enter or paste your chat text here...

processing.title: Processing Your Chat
processing.description: We're processing your chat history, please wait

upload.title: Upload Chat History
upload.description: Select a chat history file to upload
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop file here or click to select

results.title: Processing Results
results.description: Results of your chat history processing

chat_analysis.sample_chat_text:
[2025/1/1, 01:00:00] ALICE: Happy New Year! 🎉
[2025/1/1, 01:02:00] JEFF: Happy New Year, my love! 🎆
[2025/1/1, 08:15:00] ALICE: First coffee of the year! ☕
[2025/1/1, 08:20:00] JEFF: Cheers to many more! 🥂
[2025/1/1, 10:30:00] ALICE: What's the plan for today? 🤔
[2025/1/1, 10:32:00] JEFF: Let's go for a walk in the park🌳
[2025/1/1, 11:05:00] ALICE: Sounds perfect! 🌞
[2025/1/1, 13:00:00] JEFF: Got any new year's resolutions?
[2025/1/1, 13:10:00] ALICE: To travel more! 🌍
[2025/1/1, 13:15:00] JEFF: That's a great oneI'm with you on that✈️
[2025/1/1, 14:30:00] ALICE: The weather's so nice today! ☀️
[2025/1/1, 14:35:00] JEFF: Perfect day for an adventure, don't you think?
[2025/1/1, 16:00:00] ALICE: I was thinking of getting some ice cream🍦
[2025/1/1, 16:10:00] JEFF: Oh, I'm in! What flavor?
[2025/1/1, 18:30:00] ALICE: What should we have for dinner?
[2025/1/1, 18:32:00] JEFF: Pizza? 🍕

features.title: Key Features of Chat Recap AI

easy_tools.title: Easy Creation Tools
easy_tools.description: Create your AI chat analysis with our simple interface. Perfect for analyzing WhatsApp conversations and understanding relationships.

preview.title: Real-time Preview
preview.description: See your analysis come to life as you process it. Preview your insights instantly and make informed decisions about your relationships.

sentiment_analysis.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentiment_analysis.content: Analyze the emotional tone of your conversations to understand the underlying feelings and attitudes expressed in your messages.

response_time.title: Response Time Patterns
response_time.content: Track how quickly you and your conversation partner respond to each other's messages, revealing engagement levels and communication habits.

topic_analysis.title: Topic Analysis
topic_analysis.content: Discover the most common topics and themes in your conversations, helping you understand what matters most in your relationship.

comprehensive_analysis.title: Comprehensive Chat Analysis
comprehensive_analysis.content: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze your entire chat history to provide deep insights into your communication patterns and relationship dynamics.

insights.title: Deep Insights
insights.description: Get comprehensive insights into your chat patterns and relationship dynamics with ChatRecap AI chat analysis.

pricing.title: Buy Credits for Advanced AI Analysis
pricing.description: 1 credit ≈ 5000 words now, and we are working hard to optimize the cost.

testimonial.title: Loved by Lovers
testimonial.subtitle: users who've discovered deeper insights into their relationships

items.title: Relationship Analysis
items.content: Honestly... I gotta say I'm shocked. It even identified why the relationship was over before I fully realized it myself.

items.title: Anniversary Analysis
items.content: 🥰 Check us out after a year... Amazing to see all this progress. It shows exactly how we've grown together!

items.title: Personal Growth
items.content: The brutally honest relationship tips hurt my feelings lol... but exactly what I needed to hear.

how_it_works.title: How to Analyze Your Chats with Chat Recap AI?
how_it_works.subtitle: A simple three-step process to get insights about your conversations

steps.title: Upload Chat
steps.description: Export your chat history from WhatsApp or other platforms and upload it to our secure ChatRecap AI platform

steps.title: Select Analysis
steps.description: Choose what aspects of your conversations you want to analyze - from basic patterns to deep emotional insights

steps.title: Get Insights
steps.description: Receive detailed analysis with visualizations and actionable insights about your communication patterns

messages.message1: Oh, you finally texted? Must've broken a world record 🏆🙄

messages.message3: Your pick-up lines are faster than my microwave popcorn 🍿💨
messages.message5: Miss me? I barely remember your name 😂
messages.message6: Your dating life is like my WiFi - unstable connection 📶
messages.message7: Seen your message. Will reply in 2-3 business days 📅

meta.description: Select the platform you want to analyze your chat from

chatrecapplatform.title: Choose Your Chat Platform
chatrecapplatform.description: Select the platform you want to analyze your chat history from. We support multiple messaging platforms to provide comprehensive insights.

whatsapp.description: Analyze your WhatsApp conversations to understand your messaging patterns and relationship dynamics.

instagram.description: Discover insights from your Instagram direct messages and understand your communication style.

discord.description: Analyze your Discord chats to better understand your communication in gaming and community contexts.

telegram.description: Get insights from your Telegram conversations and understand your messaging patterns.

snapchat.description: Analyze your Snapchat conversations to understand your communication style and patterns.

payment.description: Use AI to deeply analyze your chat history and get personality insights and relationship analysis

errors.result_not_found: Analysis result not found. Please try uploading your file again.
errors.loading_failed: Failed to load analysis data. Please try again.
errors.ai_insights_not_found: AI insights not found. You may need to purchase AI analysis for this chat.
errors.not_found: Analysis not found. Please try uploading your file again.
errors.order_not_found: Order not found. Please try again.
errors.file_not_found: File not found. Please try uploading your file again.
errors.payment_processing_failed: Payment processing failed. Please try again.

processing_errors.no_messages: No valid messages could be extracted
processing_errors.filter_too_strict: Warning: All messages were filtered out, filter conditions may be too strict
processing_errors.single_participant: Only one participant detected, this may not be a conversation
processing_errors.short_timespan: Conversation timespan is very short, may not be a complete conversation

response_patterns.evening_active: Quick responses in evening, slower in morning
response_patterns.morning_active: More active in morning than evening
response_patterns.consistent: Consistent response times throughout the day

chatrecapresult.timespan_format: Your story began on {startMonth} {startDay}, {startYear} {startDayName} 00:00, unfolding over {durationText}, until {endMonth} {endDay}, {endYear} {endDayName} 23:59—leaving an everlasting mark in the passage of time.

analysis_card.example_description: Below are examples of analysis cards with different metrics

user_satisfaction.title: User Satisfaction
user_satisfaction.content:
This quarter's user satisfaction reached 85%, a 5 percentage point increase compared to last quarter.
The main growth came from the launch of new product features and user interface optimizations.
User feedback shows that response speed and ease of use are the main factors for improved satisfaction.
It is recommended to continue optimizing the user experience, especially in mobile operation processes.

conversion_rate.title: Conversion Rate
conversion_rate.content:
This month's conversion rate is 62%, down 3 percentage points from last month.
Analysis shows that the decline in conversion rate is mainly due to the poor quality of new promotion channels.
High-quality traffic conversion rates remain stable, but an increase in low-quality traffic has led to an overall decline in conversion rates.
It is recommended to optimize traffic sources, improve visitor quality, and enhance landing page experience.

system_performance.title: System Performance
system_performance.content:
System performance metrics reached 93%, at the best historical level.
Server response time decreased by an average of 200ms, and page loading speed increased by 15%.
Database query optimization and CDN deployment are the main reasons for performance improvement.
It is recommended to continue monitoring peak performance and consider further cache strategy optimization.

chatrecapresult.overview_story_part1: Your conversation tells a beautiful story through {totalMessages} messages exchanged over time. {sender1Name} sent {sender1Messages} messages, while {sender2Name} responded with {sender2Messages} messages.
chatrecapresult.overview_story_part2: Together, you've woven a tapestry of {totalWords} words, with {sender1Name} contributing {sender1Words} words and {sender2Name} sharing {sender2Words} words. Your conversations are meaningful and substantial, with an average of {wordsPerMessage} words per message.
chatrecapresult.overview_story_part3: Your most active conversations happen on {mostActiveDay}, with an average of {avgMessagesPerDay} messages exchanged daily. The typical response time of {responseTime} shows the eager anticipation you both feel when communicating with each other.
chatrecapresult.sentiment_description: Your conversations have a sentiment score of {sentimentScore}, which indicates a {sentimentDescription} emotional tone. This reflects the overall mood and feeling of your exchanges.
chatrecapresult.time_distribution_description: You tend to chat most during the evening ({evening}%), followed by afternoon ({afternoon}%) and morning ({morning}%). This pattern shows when you're both most available and engaged in conversation.
chatrecapresult.response_pattern_description: Your typical response pattern is "{responsePattern}". Your conversations tend to be "{conversationLength}".
chatrecapresult.daily_activity_description: Your conversations are most active on {mostActiveDay}s around {mostActiveHour}. This consistent pattern suggests you both prioritize making time for each other during these periods.
chatrecapresult.story_timeline_description: Your story began on {startDate}, unfolding over {duration} days, until {endDate}—leaving an everlasting mark in the passage of time.

relationship_metrics_hearts.title: Relationship Quality Metrics
relationship_metrics_hearts.description: Analysis of key relationship quality indicators based on communication patterns.

ai_analysis.success_description: Your AI insights are ready to view.
ai_analysis.failed_description: We couldn't complete the AI analysis. Please try again.
ai_analysis.error_description: An error occurred during AI analysis. Please try again later.

relationship_analysis.title: {sender}'s Communication Analysis
relationship_analysis.description: Analysis of communication patterns and relationship dynamics based on message history.

communication_comparison.title: Communication Comparison: {sender1} vs {sender2}
communication_comparison.description: A comparison of communication patterns and relationship dynamics between both parties.
